verbs.description: [ARG0: creamy lemon pasta and spaghetti squash alfredo] [V: give] [ARG2: pasta] [ARG1: an exciting twist with zesty lemon cream sauce] and transform rich pasta alfredo into a healthy dinner with spaghetti squash and greek yogurt
